item.title: Bond Traders Eye Make-or-Break Data to Chart the Fedâ€™s Next Move
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Bond traders are bracing for a deluge of data that will solidify expectations for how quickly the Federal Reserve will continue the interest-rate cuts that have driven US Treasuries to the biggest gains since 2020. The end of the government shutdown means that agencies will start rele...
